SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.recorder

Interface Recorder

public interface Recorder
The Recorder interface defines the basic actions for saving, loading, and controlling the playback of recordings. Implementations of this interface provides mechanisms for undoing and redoing actions that were recorded in previous games as well as playing and pausing recordings. Saving to and loading from file is delegated to Persistence package.

Usage Example: 

     undoButton.addActionListener(recorder.undo());
     undoButton.addActionListener(recorder.redo());
     undoButton.addActionListener(recorder.play());

     //On tick
     recorder.tick(userCommand);

  • Method Details

    • setCommands

      void setCommands(List<nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.Inputs.Command> commands)
      Save the current recording to a file. The name of the saved file will be chosen internally.
      Parameters:
      commands - A list of all commands recorded in that game.

    • setPlaybackSpeed

      void setPlaybackSpeed(int tickTime)
      Sets the speed of the timer that replays the recording
      Parameters:
      tickTime - in millis

    • getCommands

      List<nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.Inputs.Command> getCommands()
      Get the current commands, so that we can pass them to persistence for saving
      Returns:
      all current commands, unmodifiable list

    • tick

      void tick(nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.app.Inputs.Command commandToSave)
      Saves all info needed to replay this tick. Should be called every time the player "ticks" and moves.
      Parameters:
      commandToSave - Will be stored, then saved to a file, so the game can be replayed later.

    • undo

      Action undo()
      Supplies an action that can be given to a Button. The internal undo logic will be executed when this action is called.
      Returns:
      an Action which calls the undo method

    • redo

      Action redo()
      Supplies an action that can be given to a Button. The internal redo logic will be executed when this action is called.
      Returns:
      an Action which calls the redo method

    • redoAll

      void redoAll()
      Redo all commands that were recorded to go to the final game state

    • play

      Action play()
      Supplies an action that can be given to a Button. The internal play logic will be executed when this action is called.
      Returns:
      an Action which calls the play method

    • pause

      void pause()
      The internal pause logic will be executed when this action is called, stopping the playback of the recorder timer

    • takeControl

      void takeControl()
      Deletes all the recorded actions after this point, allowing you to resume play.

    • canUndo

      boolean canUndo()
      Can you undo? Checks to see if the stack of commands is empty.
      Returns:
      if you are able to undo

    • canRedo

      boolean canRedo()
      Can you redo? Checks to see if the stack of undos is empty.
      Returns:
      if you are able to redo
